title: League of Legends: Swarm Tier List
description: A guide to the best champions for the new League of Legends game mode, Swarm.
heading: League of Legends: Swarm Tier List
introText: A guide to the best champions for the new League of Legends game mode, Swarm.

data.itemDescription: Yasuo is a powerful champion who can easily take down multiple enemies at once with his ultimate ability, Last Breath
Xayah is another great pick for Swarm, as her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, allows her to deal damage to multiple enemies while also being mobile
Illaoi is a tanky champion who can control the battlefield with her tentacles. Her ultimate ability, Unleash the Kraken, can deal massive damage to multiple enemies
Kindred is a mobile champion who can deal damage to multiple enemies with their ultimate ability, Wolf's Frenzy
Elise is a versatile champion who can be played as either a tank or a damage dealer. Her ultimate ability, Cocoon, can stun multiple enemies
Twitch is a ranged champion who can deal damage to multiple enemies with his ultimate ability, Spray and Pray
Teemo is a champion who can place mushrooms that damage enemies. His ultimate ability, Noxious Trap, can deal damage to multiple enemies
Ziggs is a ranged champion who can deal damage to multiple enemies with his ultimate ability, Mega Inferno Bomb
Jinx is a ranged champion who can deal damage to multiple enemies with her ultimate ability, Rocket Launcher. However, she is considered to be the worst champion in Swarm due to her lack of mobility
